{{Description|Among the many Phantasmal Conches scattered around the [[Golden Apple Archipelago]], some might play the voices they recorded when being touched, while others might show you projections of the past. What hidden stories lie within them..}}
'''Resonating Visions''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 2.8]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2022/07/15 10:00 - End of Version 2.8 (2022/08/24 05:59)

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 32 or above
* Reach [[Golden Apple Archipelago]] in the quest "[[The Golden Apple Vacation Returns!|Summertime Odyssey: I]]"

===Summary===
* During the event, collect the specified number of Phantasmal Conches to obtain rewards such as [[Fischl]]'s outfit, "[[Ein Immernachtstraum]]" and [[Primogem]]s.

==Phantasmal Conches==
{{Main|Resonating Visions/Story}}
Phantasmal Conches can be found in the [[Golden Apple Archipelago/2.8|Golden Apple Archipelago]]. For locations see the [https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html#/map/12?shown_types=383,362 Teyvat Interactive Map] or [[Resonating Visions/Story]].
